cards.rules_text:
Scry 2, then draw two cards.
Foretell {1}{U} [i](During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You could get lost for days just looking at it.”[/i]
